verbs.description: 7 things to [V: know] [ARG2: about succession to the british throne] [ARGM-ADV: as] the next in line to inherit the crown royal heirs are entitled to a number of privileges but there are also customs and traditions in place within the british monarchy princess charlotte of wales royal central prince harry of wales george ii of great britain charles prince of wales prince george duke of kent edward viii cambridge parliament of the united kingdom prince philip duke of edinburgh
